meanings.definition: In a prudent or prepared manner
meanings.sent1: She packed her bag forehandedly before the trip.
meanings.sent2: He always saves money forehandedly for unexpected expenses.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel forehandedly stored nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The teacher forehandedly planned engaging activities for the class.
meanings.sent5: Forehandedly checking the weather forecast, she brought an umbrella.

meanings.definition: In an anticipatory or forward-thinking manner
meanings.sent1: Forehandedly, he set reminders for important meetings.
meanings.sent2: She forehandedly researched the best route to avoid traffic.
meanings.sent3: The chef forehandedly prepared extra ingredients in case of a rush.
meanings.sent4: The captain forehandedly charted a course to avoid the storm.
meanings.sent5: Forehandedly considering all possibilities, she made a contingency plan.
